column4: does anyone have some time for a noob? i use 7.04, activated the nvidia driver and x doesnt start anymore "no screens found" so i'm guessing there's something wrong with my xorg.conf
you should switch to a terminal (ctrl-alt-f1) and run the x reconfig script - someone here knows the command or you can look it up on google
the only thing in the log is "no screens found"
